Much of the the response has focused on calls for a new Chancellor. Multiple member of the faculty have publicly called for a new chancellor, and signatures are being gathered on petitions for a new chancellor. On November 19, approximately 1000 students and supporters participated in a silent protest against the Chancellor. <ref>[http://www.dailykos.com/story/2011/11/20/1038428/-UC-Davis:-Speechless?via=blog_650155 UC Davis: Speechless ]</ref>
